attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt as chairman of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And abandon the 1971 Misuse of Drugs Act  in favor of a policy based on scientific evidence of banned substances relative harm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
